name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 104
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, For Your Punishment. Inspired partly by the film US by Jordan Peele, which Peele described as a film that looked to comment on the “ramifications of privilege,” I believe it’s only a matter of time before the underprivileged and exploited rise up and “fight back” for a better life in the same way the tethered did in US. Hopefully the privileged will be prepared for the punishment they’ll receive.
